name: Jon's Choccy Jump
description:
In a world

where Huxley, the dark overlord, is bringing destruction upon the land of Cringios 

you take on the role of Jonathan, their humble (and sexy) servant.

Collect as much Chocolate milk for your master before they completly obliterate the city.

Important notice

This game is a prototype & still in development,

We are unable to provide more information about the Characters and Setting at this point as they are part of a different planned Project in the far future.
